name: Introduction to Rocket Propulsion
description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion and rocket engines.

lessons.name: History of Rocketry
lessons.description: A brief history of rocketry and space exploration.

lessons.name: Rocket Propulsion Fundamentals
lessons.description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion.

lessons.name: Rocket Engine Types
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket engines.

name: Fuel and Combustion
description: Understanding rocket fuel, combustion processes, and efficiency.

lessons.name: Rocket Fuel
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket fuels.

lessons.name: Combustion Processes
lessons.description: Understanding combustion processes and efficiency.

lessons.name: Combustion Instability
lessons.description: Understanding combustion instability and mitigation.

name: Nozzle Design
description: Principles of rocket nozzle design and performance optimization.

lessons.name: Nozzle Design
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket nozzles.

lessons.name: Nozzle Performance
lessons.description: Understanding nozzle performance and efficiency.

lessons.name: Nozzle Optimization
lessons.description: Optimizing nozzle design for specific applications.

name: Fundamentals of Aerodynamics
description: Basic aerodynamic concepts and fluid dynamics principles.

lessons.name: Fluid Mechanics Foundations
lessons.description: Introduction to viscous flow and boundary layers.

lessons.name: Compressible Flow
lessons.description: Introduction to compressible flow regimes and Mach number.

lessons.name: Introduction to Aerodynamics
lessons.description: Overview of aerodynamics and its importance in aerospace engineering.

name: Subsonic and Supersonic Flow
description: Understanding subsonic and supersonic aerodynamic behaviors.

lessons.name: Basic Aerodynamics
lessons.description: Introduction to aerodynamic forces and moments..

lessons.name: Shock Waves and Expansion Waves
lessons.description: Analysis of expansion waves and their role in supersonic flow phenomena.

lessons.name: Applications and Case Studies
lessons.description: Application of subsonic and supersonic flow principles to aerospace vehicle design, propulsion systems, and aerodynamic optimization

name: Aerodynamic Heating
description: Study of aerodynamic heating and thermal protection systems.

lessons.name: Thermodynamics
lessons.description: Analysis of thermodynamic effects on vehicle surfaces and components subjected to aerodynamic heating

lessons.name: Aerodynamic Heating Effects
lessons.description: Understanding the mechanisms and consequences of aerodynamic heating on vehicle surfaces, including thermal stress, material degradation, and structural integrity.

lessons.name: Ablative Heat Shield Design
lessons.description: Principles of ablative heat shield materials and design strategies for protecting spacecraft during atmospheric re-entry.

name: Spacecraft Structural Design
description: Fundamentals of designing spacecraft structures and materials selection.

lessons.name: Introduction to Spacecraft Structures
lessons.description: Overview of spacecraft structural design principles and objectives.

lessons.name: Design of Structural Elements
lessons.description: Design principles for structural elements such as frames, panels, ribs, and joints.

lessons.name: Structural Analysis Methods
lessons.description: Buckling, vibration, and stability analysis of spacecraft structures.

name: Orbital Mechanics
description: Understanding orbital dynamics and mission planning.

lessons.name: Introduction to Orbital Mechanics
lessons.description: Overview of basic concepts such as Kepler's laws of planetary motion.

lessons.name: Two-Body Orbital Motion
lessons.description: Analysis of elliptical, parabolic, and hyperbolic orbits.

lessons.name: Spacecraft Dynamics and Control
lessons.description: Dynamics of rigid body motion in space.

name: Spacecraft Systems Engineering
description: Overview of spacecraft systems and subsystems engineering.

lessons.name: Spacecraft Design and Architecture
lessons.description: Design considerations for different types of spacecraft (e.g., satellites, probes, rovers).

lessons.name: Spacecraft Mission Planning and Operations
lessons.description: Mission analysis and planning, including mission objectives, constraints, and requirements.

lessons.name: Spacecraft Reliability and Safety
lessons.description: Reliability engineering principles applied to spacecraft systems.
